header.title: 3 women in male-dominated industries get real about sexism
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Maria Petterson (airline pilot) Charlotte Langley (Chef), and Natalie Panek (rocket scientist) dish on the realities of progressing in male-dominated fields.
header.socioLingVar: Gender - General,Age - Youngsters,Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments,Sexual Identity - Male homosexuality
